Title: 🖼 We are heartbroken to report on the death of an additional IDF...
Description: We are heartbroken to report on the death of an additional IDF soldier: 🕯️Major (res.) Yotam Itzhak Peled (34). Yotam was killed in Gaza during this current operation against Hamas terrorists.May his memory forever be a blessing. 🕯️

Title: UPDATE: Two soldiers severely injured from a direct impact of an ...
Description: UPDATE: Two soldiers severely injured from a direct impact of an explosive attack drone fired by Hezbollah from Lebanon towards northern Israel earlier this morning . Also, more than 55 rockets were fired in the last barrage of rockets towards northern Israel.

Title: Update: So far, Hezbollah terrorists fired over 55 rockets from L...
Description: Update: So far, Hezbollah terrorists fired over 55 rockets from Lebanon towards Israel’s north.

Title: 🖼 🚨 BREAKING: Multiple red alert sirens in Israel’s north. Deta...
Description: 🚨 BREAKING: Multiple red alert sirens in Israel’s north. Details to follow.

Title: 🎬 WATCH: The IDF has identified and dismantled around 50 Hamas u...
Description: WATCH: The IDF has identified and dismantled around 50 Hamas underground terror tunnel routes in the Philadelphi Corridor in Rafah, Gaza. 🎥: IDF

Title: IDF: Following the sirens that sounded at 14:10 in the area of th...
Description: IDF: Following the sirens that sounded at 14:10 in the area of the Golan Heights, one suspicious aerial target was intercepted after crossing from Lebanon into Israeli territory. No injuries were reported. Additionally, approximately five projectiles were identified crossing from Lebanon into Israeli territory and falling in open areas in the area of Shamir. A siren was sounded in open areas according to protocol. No injuries were reported. Following the sirens that sounded at 14:29 in the area of the Upper Galilee, approximately 20 projectiles were identified crossing from Lebanon into Israeli territory. The majority were intercepted, and some fell in the area of Shamir, mostly in open areas. No injuries were reported.

Title: 🎬 🚨BREAKING: Following multiple rockets fired by Hezbollah from...
Description: 🚨BREAKING: Following multiple rockets fired by Hezbollah from Lebanon toward northern Israel, several impacts in open fields were reported. A fire has erupted near Kibbutz Shamir in northern Israel. #israelunderattack

Title: 🖼 On Tuesday, Hamas terrorists fired rockets from the Humanitari...
Description: On Tuesday, Hamas terrorists fired rockets from the Humanitarian Route in Khan Yunis, Gaza, towards central Israel. Hamas not only endangers Israeli civilians but continues to strategically and purposefully position its military assets within humanitarian infrastructure and civilian-populated areas.

Title: IDF: A short while ago, a projectile that was identified crossing...
Description: IDF: A short while ago, a projectile that was identified crossing from the Gaza Strip fell in the maritime space in central Israel. In accordance with protocol, no sirens were sounded.Simultaneously, an additional projectile that did not cross into Israeli territory was identified.

Title: 🚨 BREAKING: At least 2 rockets fired from Gaza towards central I...
Description: 🚨 BREAKING: At least 2 rockets fired from Gaza towards central Israel. Large explosions heard in Tel Aviv. Reports indicate both rockets exploded in the sea. No physical injuries or damage reported.

Title: 🎬 WATCH: An explosive attack drone fired by Hezbollah terrorists...
Description: WATCH: An explosive attack drone fired by Hezbollah terrorists from Lebanon was intercepted by the IDF over northern Israel earlier this morning.

Title: IDF: A short while ago, a shooting attack occurred in the city of...
Description: IDF: A short while ago, a shooting attack occurred in the city of Qalqilya during which a terrorist fired at an Israeli civilian who was in the city, injuring him and two Palestinians. The Israeli civilian was evacuated to a hospital to receive medical treatment.IDF forces conducted a pursuit after the terrorist and neutralized him adjacent to Qalqilya.

Title: 🚨BREAKING: Suspected shooting terror attack in Qalqilya, the Wes...
Description: 🚨BREAKING: Suspected shooting terror attack in Qalqilya, the West Bank/Judea and Samaria. One person has been injured. The terrorist has been shot and killed. Details to follow.

Title: 🖼 We are heartbroken to report on the death of an additional IDF...
Description: We are heartbroken to report on the death of an additional IDF soldier: 🕯️Sergeant Omer Ginzburg (19). Omer was killed in Gaza during this current operation against Hamas terrorists.May his memory forever be a blessing. 🕯️

Title: IDF: Following the sirens that sounded a short while ago in north...
Description: IDF: Following the sirens that sounded a short while ago in northern Israel, approximately 30 projectiles were identified crossing from Lebanon toward the area of Kabri, a number of which fell in open areas. No injuries were reported. The IDF is striking the sources of fire.

Title: 🚨 Moments ago, over 10 rockets were fired from Lebanon by Hezbol...
Description: 🚨 Moments ago, over 10 rockets were fired from Lebanon by Hezbollah terrorists towards northern Israeli communities. No physical injuries reported thus far. #israelunderattack

Title: 🖼 We are heartbroken to report that Yonatan Deutsch (23) has bee...
Description: We are heartbroken to report that Yonatan Deutsch (23) has been identified as the person murdered in the shooting terror attack, in the area of the Mehola Junction in the West Bank/Judea and Samaria. He was supposed to get married in a month. May his memory forever be a blessing. 🕯️ Pursuit after the terrorists is still underway.

Title: We are heartbroken to report that one person has been murdered in...
Description: We are heartbroken to report that one person has been murdered in a terror shooting attack in the area of the Mehola Junction in the West Bank/Judea and Samaria. At least one more person was moderately injured in the attack. May the victim’s memory forever be a blessing.🕯️
